response.original_title: Un corto festivo: la mejor Navidad
response.overview: In a touching story directed by Taika Waititi, Santa Claus misinterprets the scribble on a little girl’s letter as a Christmas wish. When she wakes up on Christmas morning, she finds a new friend under the tree… as unexpected as he is endearing.
response.title: Un corto festivo: la mejor Navidad
